channel.title: Help please

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @selkirk23 selkirk23
item.description:
@selkirk23 wrote:

I am adding this to my class 8 for a dragonfire shield and i ave already put my model in the models folder.
if(i == 2621)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 10067;

class8.anInt200 = 10068;//female wearing
class8.aString170 = “Dragonfire shield”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A heavy shield with a snarling, draconic visage.”.getBytes();//examin info
}
once i add this and the model, and this to my class 8 and compile; the evil helmet fences come up on my client; anyone know any specific place i should put this or if its an incorrect model? (my dfs had no animation just kinda would be next to you and not move this fixes that problem but brings up another -_-) any help would great.
